page.title: 04CROWLE LIBRARY
page.content: CROWLE LIBRARY WAS OPENED IN JULY 1972 AND HAS APPROXIMATELY 13,500 BOOKS. THERE IS A LARGE FICTION SECTION AND ALSO A CHILDRENS SECTION. UPSTAIRS IS A SMALL REFERENCE SECTION AND SOME DESKS FOR STUDYING. THERE ARE ABOUT 2,000 MEMBERS IN CROWLE AND ABOUT 250 BOOKS ARE BORROWED EVERY DAY. FICTION IS THE MOST POPULAR. A LIBRARIAN AND TWO ASSISTANTS RUN THE LIBRARY. THEY HAVE AN{ELECTRONIC CATALOGUE}WITH FICHE DISCS. THIS ENLARGES VERY SMALL PAGES SO THAT THEY APPEAR ON THE SCREEN. PERIODIC DISPLAYS OF INTERESTING ITEMS TAKE PLACE AND LOCAL ORGANISATIONS ADVERTISE THEIR PROJECTS. THE LIBRARY HAS A{CLUB}FOR CHILDREN EVERY FORTNIGHT WHICH IS FREE. THEY HAVE GAMES AND QUIZZES.
